root.name: Karaoke Revolution
root.description: Karaoke Revolution returns (minus the American Idol brand) with an all-new lineup of music, characters, and venues. As a first for Karaoke Revolution, the new version includes 50 new master tracks. Choose from 16 different venues and various online modes (Xbox 360 and PS3 only). There are more character customizations including wild outfits and accessories and you can even create your own custom venues. New songs can be obtained as downloadable master tracks on the Xbox 360 and PS3. New Features50 all new licensed master tracks, featuring contemporary hits and classic favoritesTen brand new venues featuring elaborate themes, special effects, intricate lighting, and amazing pyrotechnics Custom venue creator where players can design and personalize up to six venues of their ownIncludes an option to feature original music videos on-stage during a player’s full performance Compatible with existing DLC library of 200 songs, in addition to all new DLC Newly improved custom character creator with extensive features to choose from Compatible with both wireless microphones and USB microphones Xbox LIVE Vision camera and EyeToy support in online games Master Track Song List: "7 Things" - Miley Cyrus"ABC" - The Jackson 5"Addicted to Love - Robert Palmer"Ain't No Stoppin' Us Now" - McFadden Whitehead"American Boy" - Estelle feat. Kanye West"Beautiful" - Akon feat. Colby O'Donis"Ben" - Michael Jackson"Black Horse and The Cherry Tree" - KT Tunstall"Burning Down the House" - Talking Heads"Crazy" - Seal"Da Ya Think I'm Sexy?" - Rod Stewart"Dancing Machine" - The Jackson 5"Disturbia" - Rihanna"Feels Like Tonight" - Daughtry"Gives You Hell" - All American Rejects"Human" - The Killers"I Kissed a Girl" - Katy Perry"I Melt With You" - Modern English"I Ran (So Far Away)" - A Flock Of Seagulls"I Want You Back" - The Jackson 5"I'll Be There" - The Jackson 5"I'm Yours" - Jason Mraz"Just Dance" - Lady Gaga feat. Colby O'Donis"L.E.S. Artistes" - Santigold"Love Hurts" - Incubus"Love Is a Battlefield" - Pat Benatar"Love Story" - Taylor Swift"Man On The Moon" - R.E.M."My Life Would Suck Without You" - Kelly Clarkson"Rehab" - Amy Winehouse"Sex On Fire" - Kings of Leon"Shout" - Tears for Fears"Smile" - Lily Allen"So What" - Pink"Solid" - Ashford and Simpson"Soul Meets Body" - Death Cab For Cutie"Space Oddity" - David Bowie"The Logical Song" - Supertramp"This Love" - Maroon 5"Viva La Vida" - Coldplay"What Have I Done To Deserve This?" - Pet Shop Boys Dusty Springfield"What Hurts The Most" - Rascal Flatts"Wicked Game" - Chris Isaak"You Found Me" - The Fray
